另一評級機構惠譽較早時亦將波音的前景評級，由穩定下調至負面，並確認對波音的A信用評級。

Intel (INTC) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates

Intel (INTC) came out with quarterly earnings of $1.52 per share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.24 per share. This compares to earnings of $1.28 per share a year ago. These figures are adjusted for non-recurring items.

This quarterly report represents an earnings surprise of 22.58%. A quarter ago, it was expected that this world's largest chipmaker would post earnings of $1.24 per share when it actually produced earnings of $1.42, delivering a surprise of 14.52%.

Over the last four quarters, the company has surpassed consensus EPS estimates four times.

Intel, which belongs to the Zacks Semiconductor - General industry, posted revenues of $20.21 billion for the quarter ended December 2019, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 5.24%. This compares to year-ago revenues of $18.66 billion. The company has topped consensus revenue estimates four times over the last four quarters.

The sustainability of the stock's immediate price movement based on the recently-released numbers and future earnings expectations will mostly depend on management's commentary on the earnings call.

Intel shares have added about 4.8% since the beginning of the year versus the S&P 500's gain of 2.8%.
